elements.name: framelix-button
elements.description: A clickable button with some customization options. Accept's a language key as label as well.

attributes.name: request-options
attributes.description: Onclick making a request based on this options. Generate with new JsRequestOptions(PHP)|FramelixTypeDefJsRequestOptions.toAttrValue(JS)

attributes.name: block
attributes.description: Display as block element instead if inline

attributes.name: raw
attributes.description: Just display the inner HTML as given, do not perform html modifications inside the tag.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disabled buttons are not clickable

attributes.name: small
attributes.description: A small button with less padding and font size

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Load given url on click

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Target of href attribute if provided

values.name: _top
values.description: Top window (Helpful when inside an iframe)

attributes.name: confirm-message
attributes.description: On button click, show this confirm message an proceed only if user accept confirm message

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: A material icon

attributes.name: bgcolor
attributes.description: HTML Color (Any possible color including css variables)

attributes.name: textcolor
attributes.description: HTML Text Color (Any possible color including css variables)

attributes.name: theme
attributes.description: Theme styling

elements.name: framelix-image
elements.description: Display a responsive image tag that uses optimized thumbnails and lazy load.

attributes.name: minwidth
attributes.description: Minimal width of image in pixel

attributes.name: maxwidth
attributes.description: Maximal width of image in pixel

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: Default image url

attributes.name: nolazy
attributes.description: Disable lazy loading and display immediately

attributes.name: setparent
attributes.description: Set the image url into the parents css background-image instead of an explicit image tag

attributes.name: recalculate
attributes.description: The image is placed in a resizable container. Automatically recalculate matched thumbnail size after resize.

attributes.name: size-*
attributes.description: Specific image urls provided for a max size of given width

elements.name: framelix-alert
elements.description: Display a alert box with an optional hidable button. Accept's a language key as content as well.

attributes.name: hidable
attributes.description: ID of the container. If set, the user can hide the alert and this choice will be remembered based on the ID provided. In the backend choice can be deleted with the settings buttons at the top right.

attributes.name: header
attributes.description: A text to display as header inside the alert. Accept's a language key as well.
